description: A general purpose schema for varied Access Logs
name: Access Logs

owner.description: The canonical user ID(alternate AWS account id) of the owner of the source bucket.

resource_path.description: The Route Key/Resource Path of the API request, for example /pets. Will include the path pattern used to handle the request.

signature_version.description: The signature version, SigV2 or SigV4, that was used to authenticate the request or a - for unauthenticated requests.
